_comment: Created by ianb on 08/10/2013 13:46:50 using v0.9
title: How has the number of MRSA infections changed?
analysis_commentary: From 2007, the level of hospital acquired MRSA also became a major national concern, similar to C difficile. The number of MRSA cases has reduced by 79% in the six years since this focus in 2007/08.
data_source: Health Protection Agency, Mandatory surveillance of bacteraemia
